text: Eduardo Trillini (born 20 June 1958) is an Argentine former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Argentina Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists from Buenos Aires Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Argentina Category:Cyclists at the 1979 Pan American Games
title: Eduardo Trillini
